RDF (turtle)
Code Repository
https://github.com/AGLDWG/iso19160-1-address-ont

Description

This ontology is an OWL ontology version of the New Zealand Profile of ISO 19160-1:2015 Addressing.

Table of Contents

  1. Classes
  2. Namespaces
  3. Legend

Overview

Pictures say 1,000 words
Figure 1: Ontology overview

Classes ↑

  • Address Alias
  • Address Component
  • Address Period
  • Addressable Object

Address Aliasc

URI http://linked.data.gov.au/def/iso19160-1-address-nz-profile#AddressAlias
Description

ISO 19160 Address Alias class with the additional restrictions of requiring Address Alias lifecycle stage properties to have Address Lifecycle Stage class object and Address Alias lifespan to have Lifespan class objects as their range values.
Super-classes http://linked.data.gov.au/def/iso19160-1-address#AddressAliasc
Restrictions http://linked.data.gov.au/def/iso19160-1-address#AddressAlias.lifespan only http://linked.data.gov.au/def/iso19160-1-address#Lifespanc
http://linked.data.gov.au/def/iso19160-1-address#AddressAlias.lifecycleStage only http://linked.data.gov.au/def/iso19160-1-address#AddressLifecycleStagec

Address Componentc

URI http://linked.data.gov.au/def/iso19160-1-address-nz-profile#AddressComponent
Description

ISO 19160 Address Component class with the additional restrictions of requiring one and only one Address lifespan, Address provenance, Address Component lifecycle stage and an Address Component Value locale properties
Super-classes http://linked.data.gov.au/def/iso19160-1-address#AddressComponentc
Restrictions http://linked.data.gov.au/def/iso19160-1-address#Address.provenance exactly 1
http://linked.data.gov.au/def/iso19160-1-address#Address.lifespan exactly 1
http://linked.data.gov.au/def/iso19160-1-address#AddressComponentValue.locale exactly 0
http://linked.data.gov.au/def/iso19160-1-address#AddressComponent.lifecycleStage exactly 1

Addressable Objectc

URI http://linked.data.gov.au/def/iso19160-1-address-nz-profile#AddressableObject
Description

ISO 19160 Addressable Object class with the additional restrictions of requiring one and only one Address Component lifespan, Address Component position and an Address Component lifecycle stage properties.
Super-classes http://linked.data.gov.au/def/iso19160-1-address#AddressableObjectc
Restrictions http://linked.data.gov.au/def/iso19160-1-address#Address.position exactly 0
http://linked.data.gov.au/def/iso19160-1-address#AddressComponent.lifecycleStage exactly 1
http://linked.data.gov.au/def/iso19160-1-address#Address.lifespan exactly 1

Address Periodc

URI http://linked.data.gov.au/def/iso19160-1-address-nz-profile#AddressedPeriod
Description

ISO 19160 Addressed Period class with the additional restriction of requiring at most one Address provenance properties.
Super-classes http://linked.data.gov.au/def/iso19160-1-address#AddressedPeriodc
Restrictions http://linked.data.gov.au/def/iso19160-1-address#Address.provenance only http://linked.data.gov.au/def/iso19160-1-address#AddressProvenancec
http://linked.data.gov.au/def/iso19160-1-address#Address.provenance max 1
